Detailed Description

AtlItemMenuWindow is a special atl window which handles feature items and feature item containers. It is used to display full sized menus and popup menus. It must be parameterized with a MenuID. With this MenuID, it gets the corresponding feature item container from the static menu pool. The AtlItemMenuWindow uses an ItemMenu of Apoxi/Gui to display the feature item container and it's feature items. Each menu entry (FeatureItem or FeatureItemContainer) can have a specified context id, which overwrites the context of the window.

void AtlItemMenuWindow::OnLoseFocus (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Before opening an AtlItemMenuWindow the foreground window of the active application is set as parent window. If the parent window is closed (eg. active call gets disconnected) the AtlItemMenuWindow should also be closed.

Reimplemented from AtlWindow.
